title: Aid the Underduke
content: trance.) Talk to Nine-Fingers in her office and learn that she has laid a trap to deal with that Stonelord, but won't tell you the details. Luckily 2 drunken guild members let slip that Nine-Fingers plans to ambush Minsc at City's Counting House. You can also find the details of the plan from Uktar (near X-30, Y754) by choosing "The Quicker I deal with the Stone Lord, the quicker Nine-Fingers gets back to business". The note in Keene's room also gives away her plan. Travel to the Counting House
